FuncDef: This command configures a destination IP address range to be used as an IP filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address for the IP match criterion in dotted decimal notation. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255.
Creates a list of IPv4 prefixes for match criteria in IPv4 ACL and CPM filter policies.
A string of up to 32 characters of printable ASCII characters. If special characters are used, the string must be enclosed within double quotes.
Specifies the subnet mask length expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 32.
Specifies the dotted quad equivalent of the mask length. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255.
